title: Wadjet-eye Amulet
description:
Pale green faience eye-amulet. Conventional late form with details incised on obverse, reverse plain. Pierced horizontally through center. 
Condition: Glaze discolored. Minor chips.
credit_line: Gift of the Egypt Exploration Fund
